# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- Use clear and concise comments in your code to enhance readability.
- Follow best practices for code organization and structure.

## Code Style
- Adhere to C# naming conventions for classes, methods, and variables.
- Use consistent indentation and spacing throughout your code.

## Project-Specific Rules
- The project is an ASP.NET Core MVC application called 'RealEstatePro'.
- Use SQLite as the database for the application.
- Implement Docker for deployment on Render.
- Implement direct image upload functionality within the application.
